tool_description: Creates customizable journal entry templates with predefined sections, prompts, and formatting structures.

template_type.description: Type of template: daily, gratitude, reflection, goal_tracking, free_form

include_prompts.description: Whether to include writing prompts in the template

sections.description: Custom sections to include in the template

word_count_target.description: Target word count for the entry

include_metadata_fields.description: Whether to include metadata fields in template

error_messages: Invalid template type: Use one of [daily, gratitude, reflection, goal_tracking, free_form].
Invalid date format: Provide a valid date format string.
Invalid word count target: word_count_target must be a positive integer.
Custom sections format error: Provide sections as an array of strings.
usage: Specify template_type and customize with prompts, sections, and metadata fields. Set word_count_target for guided writing. Returns a structured template ready for journal entries.

template_content.description: The formatted template with sections and prompts

section_list.description: List of sections included in the template

template_instructions.description: Instructions on how to use the template effectively
